about_the_game:
Create quests to get heroes to do your bidding

Create quests to send your heroes around them realm. Choose the monsters they have to defeat, the locations they have to scout and the dungeons they need to explore!

Create your character


Choose from over 37 different heads and 10 different bodies to make your perfect avatar.

Recruit and manage unqiue heroes


Heroes are the life-blood of your adventurers guild, and you'll need a formidable roster to conquer the challenges ahead. Keep their spirits high by rewarding them, maintaining friendships, and witnessing their growth as mighty warriors, powerful mages, or swift scouts.

Expand your guild!


Take your guild to new heights by building extensions that offer unique experiences. Establish a bustling tavern where heroes share tales of past combat, while serving their favorite brews to boost their morale. Set up a map table to oversee discovered locations and detect monster threats. And who knows what secrets await in the witch's tower?

Find rare artifacts and use them for your gain


Embark on quests to unearth powerful artifacts and discover weapons of legend. Arm your heroes with these treasures to enhance their combat prowess, overcome ongoing challenges, or witness dramatic stat increases. Harness the true potential of your guild with these extraordinary relics.

Features

  • Become the manager of an adventurers guild
  • Create quests for heroes.
  • Build expansions for your guild
  • Discover monsters, towns and dungeons
  • Defeat a looming villain threatening the realm
  • Find new items to strengthen your heroes
  • Level heroes up and see them develop relationships with others

short_description: Manage a fantasy adventurer's guild and make a lot of money... I mean save the kingdom from a looming threat! Recruit heroes, create quests to send them on and upgrade your guild's facilities.
